April 2010 Abakan(lang-rusАбаканɐbɐˈkan;Khakas languageKhakas:langkjhАғбан,Aban) is thecapital citycapitaltypes of inhabited localities in Russiacityof theRepublic of Khakassia,Russia, located in the central part ofMinusinsk Depression, at theconfluenceof theYenisei RiverYeniseiandAbakan Rivers. As of theRussian Census (2010)2010 Census, it had a population of 165,214ru-pop-ref2010Censusa slight increase over 165,197 recorded during theRussian Census (2002)2002 Censusru-pop-ref2002Censusand a further increase from 154,092 recorded during theSoviet Census (1989)1989 Census.ru-pop-ref1989Census
article.heading: History
article.paragraph: Abakanskyostrog (fortress)ostrog(langruАбаканский острог), also known asAbakansk(langruАбаканск), was built at the mouth of theAbakan Riverin 1675.cite bookЭнциклопедия Города России"Cities and Towns of Russia" Encyclopedia2003Большая Российская ЭнциклопедияMoscow5-7107-7399-913In the 1780s, thevillage#RussiaseloofUst-Abakanskoye(langruУсть-Абаканское) was established in this area.It was granted town status and given its current name on April 30, 1931.Resolution of April 30, 1931
article.heading: Chinese exiles
article.paragraph: In 1940, Russian construction workers found ancient ruins during the construction of a highway between Abakan andAskiz (rural locality)Askiz. When the site was excavated by Soviet archaeologists in 19411945, they realized that they had discovered a building absolutely unique for the area: a large (1500 square meters) Chinese-style, likelyHan Dynastyera (206 BCE220 CE) palace. The identity of the high-ranking personage who lived luxuriously in Chinese style, far outside of the borders of the Han Empire, has remained a matter for discussion ever since. Russian archaeologist L.A. Yevtyukhova surmised, based on circumstantial evidence, that the palace may have been the residence ofLi Ling, a Chinese general who had been defeated by theXiongnuin 99 BCE, and defected to them as a result.harvnbYevtyukhova1954page neededAugust 2014While this opinion has remained popular, other views have been expressed as well. More recently, for example, it was claimed by A.A. Kovalyov as the residence of Lu Fang (:zh:), a Han throne pretender from theEmperor Guangwu of HanGuangwuera.harvnbKovalyov2007148
article.heading: Lithuanian exiles
article.paragraph: In the late 18th and during the 19th century, Lithuanian participants in the 1794, 18301831, and 1863 rebellions against the Russian rule were exiled to Abakan. A group oflabor campcampswas established where prisoners were forced to work in the coal mines. AfterJoseph StalinStalin's death, Lithuanian exiles from the nearby settlements moved in.harvnbJuodvalkytė2001page neededAugust 2014
article.heading: Administrative and municipal status
article.paragraph: Abakan is thecapital citycapitalof the republic.Law #20harvnbHoiberg19937Within thesubdivisions of Russia#Administrative divisionsframework of administrative divisions, it is incorporated as theCity of federal subject significanceCityof Abakanan administrative unit with the status equal to that of theadministrative divisions of the Republic of KhakassiadistrictsAs asubdivisions of Russia#Municipal divisionsmunicipal division, the City of Abakan is incorporated asAbakan Urban Okrug.Law #59
article.heading: Economy
article.paragraph: The city has ariver port, industry enterprises,Katanov State University of Khakasia, and three theatres. Furthermore, it has a commercial center that producesfootwear,foodstuffs, andmetal products.
article.heading: Transportation
article.paragraph: Abakan (together withTayshet) was a terminal of the majorAbakan-Taishet Railway. Now it is an important railway junction.
The city is served by theAbakan International Airport.
article.heading: Military
article.paragraph: The 100th Air Assault Brigade of theRussian Airborne Troopswas based in the city until ca. 1996.harvnbSchofield1993page neededAugust 2014
article.heading: Sites
article.paragraph: Abakan's sites of interest include Holy Transfiguration Cathedral, "Good Angel of Peace" sculpture, park of topiary art, and many others.
article.heading: Sports
article.paragraph: Bandyis the one of the most popular sports in the city.Sayany-KhakassiaTeam picture of Sayany-Khakassiawas playing in the top-tier Super League in the 201213 season but was relegated for the 201314 season.Russian Government Cupwas played here in 1988 and in 2012.
article.heading: Climate
article.paragraph:
Abakan has a continental climate with semi-arid influences (Kppen climate classification "BSk"). Temperature differences between seasons are extreme, which is typical for Siberia. Precipitation is concentrated in the summer and is less common because of rain shadow from nearby mountains.
